text: Sit Down, Shut Up is an animated television sitcom that aired from April 19, 2009 to November 21, 2009 on Fox. It originally aired on the "Animation Domination" block, but was removed and put on Saturdays at midnight. It was based on the Australian series which had the same name. ==References== Category:American sitcoms Category:Animated television series Category:English-language television programs
title: Sit Down, Shut Up (American TV series)
